title: My Haunting Love
description: Synopsis: Calista Rose is a 16-year-old deaf girl who senses something strange in her new home. Soon she meets a ghost named John and becomes smitten with his handsome good looks and charming ways. Little does she know, falling in love with him brings out the true evil that lingers inside her home. Can she survive My Haunting Love?
author: J.S. Wilsoncroft
